Ah...ohhh!
The hero of the Trojan War!
Wonderful! I love the Iliad!""

Have we met before?
I'm sorry...my records contain no such data...

Hnnngh! I sense one of the three presences that disturb your slumber!
Never fear, I will protect Master as you rest! So please sleep easy, Master!

The Tongue-Cut Sparrow? What's that? Let me read it.
Ha! Plotlines are all the same no matter where a story comes from!
But then again the stories of the workaholic sparrow in an inn and the crane who returns a favor are nice. The inn is like the profession of writing...requiring a diligent spirit to work.
And any editors who dare peek in to check the author's progress while he writes lose everything! Keep that in mind!

I'm the successor of the well of wisdom, huh? I'll have you know that it's not my fault that this role fell into my lap!
Eh?
I'm telling you it's definitely because I have connections with ScÃ¡thach! I KNEW she was a no-good mentor!

Everyone on the Round Table is like a younger brother to me. That's why I want to dote on them all.
Don't you think they're all cute?

I would like to buy some souvenirs for the Knights of the Round Table.
What about matching Hawaiian shirts? I can just imagine how happy they'd be to receive them.

The great...Ganesha...?
Wait a minute! There's NO WAY that's you!
Whatcha staring at? Huh!?
You don't want to get involved with a gangster, you say!?
Who you calling a gangster, dammit!?
Whaddaya mean, 	hat"?
What the hell does that mean

Wow, so you're a king? You don't look like one!
No, no, I mean it in a good way.
Oh, do you want to eat something? Want me to bake you a galette?

Gareth is a Knight of the Round Table!?
Woah...wow!
So cool! Her armor looks amazing!
I don't know why, but I could do a little dance from happiness!

BB...was it?
She acts all omnipotent, she's impertinent, she's younger than me, she's a little devil, and I feel like she lacks decorum.
Master, is she your type?

Hmmm...
I do not know why I feel restless.
I feel a tingling sensation... It is almost as if someone is staring intently at me. Perhaps it is someone who wants to protect the world's morality with me, but is shyly hiding in the bushes!

Ryouma:, Third Unit Captain Saito Hajime... A Shinsengumi member who lived through the Meiji era...
Ah, I wish I could have lived and seen the Meiji era myself...
Oryou:, ...Sorry, Ryouma.
Ryouma:, Oh...uh...that's not what I meant. Don't worry about it.

I'm getting all tingly here. Someone's here, yeah?
Alright, how 'bout we see whose electricity is stronger with a thunder match, yeah?!

Please hear me out, Chen Gong.
Lu Bu is here, I am here, and you are here.
That means...this would be an opportune time to develop a new form!
Lord Kintoki mentioned that if we want to be popular with children, we need to turn into something of that nature...
...Chen Gong? Lord Chen Gong!?
If you can at least work out how to fly...!?
...Oh. So you're a king.

Sigurd.
You are the hero who seduced our older sister!
I...we...will never forgive...!

Lord Oda Nobunaga...I've heard she is famed for being an enemy of the gods, Buddha, and all creatures; a ruthless epitome of evil. But honestly, she's different in real life than what I heard. I see...she is certainly a Demon King evil enough to use my lord as a whipping boy.
But you know, I really do think she should hold back a little on performing Atsumori.
Sorry, I lied.
I don't mean a little...I mean by a lot.

So you're a centaur from myth.
Thank you.
I rode on your back as I was leaving Earth.
I know this might just be how I imagined it, but I felt like you were protecting me.

That's the original Avenger?
Huh, is that supposed to be a joke?
Wait a second. The same class as me?
No way... My senpai is too weak...

My king,
even if not Britain, my loyalty to you remains unshaken.

Ah, it's one of Charlemagne's twelve paladins.
I heard they're a mighty warrior, dauntless, and a cheery character...
Wait a minute...he's...male? A guy?
Seriously...and this includes Roland...but those guys are really living in the future.

Mrgh.
Are there warriors nearby?
There are, aren't here?
I'm going to go invite them, so I'll step away for a while. Off I go!

Master Shuwen, what is the matter?
Hm? It looks like I'm getting dragged by the jet and I'm more vulnerable at my feet now?
...What amazing perception, O Lancer-who's-probably-stronger-without-a-spear... Oh, you're an Assassin now.
But battling with so much risk at hand and its incomprehensible super acceleration is the true essence of Jet Tennen Rishinryu!

I see, so you're sister Servants too?
A pleasure to meet you.

Mrgh.
Are there warriors nearby?
There are, aren't here?
I'm going to go invite them, so I'll step away for a while. Off I go!

Hm, I like how determined you appear.
All right. Let's do this.

So that is the Queen of the Land of Shadows... I hear she is a master of martial arts, and it's admirable that she can handle so many weapons.
Hmm? You were talking about her body? Well, I won't lose if I have my spear, but how dare you!

That Servant is from the Dark Rounds...!
...Calm yourself. Be calm, me.
She must not know that I was the source of all the Saber Badges getting distributed.
If she finds out, she'll definitely ask for sixty percent of the profits!

What about any children born outside Europe, you ask?
They are...let's see...they are like my descendants' friends!
Come, all! You're all sweeties!

Mrgh.
Are there warriors nearby?
There are, aren't here?
I'm going to go invite them, so I'll step away for a while. Off I go!

H-h-how shameless!
Absolutely not, absolutely not!
Now you listen, y-y-you must be more modest than that!
Unacceptable, unacceptable!

Hm.
Master, you are still young.
One mustn't go play around in such a colorful way. All things in moderation.
Um, well, I hate to mention this, but...there are some individuals who have extremely flashy appearances... Yes, moderation!

They appear to be confident in their singing.
If I have the opportunity, I wouldn't mind hearing them sing.

Sir Gawain!
(Phew) Remarkable.
We generated immense impact just from gently bumping our fists together. That's Sir Gawain for you.

Oh? A wielder of a demonic sword...
I too possess a such a blade.
I would warn them to be careful so as not to be consumed by evil.

Ah, the brat from the Mori clan's here too.
...What is with that face?
Want me to hurt you again?

Though you have become a Berserker and your mind is clouded by madness, your intellect remains intact...that is quite the feat, Heracles.
So you needn't be so uncomfortable around me.
His back, I recognize it. It's bigger and stronger than the one I know, but... that tragic forthrightness hasn't changed. Big brother... no, I'm not calling him that.

I love generous, fearless heroes who don't get jealous!
They do exist, right? Summon one for me right now!
I wanna put my skills to the test. How 'bout it!?

Well this is...something...
No, that look's not bad on you.
Actually, I kind of like it.

Okay, what's the first thing you do when you come back from Rayshifting?
Have you forgotten what Miss Nightingale told you to do?
That's right! Wash your hands and gargle. Good, you're so wonderful!

I've detected a warrior.
Ah, my automatic invitation mode is about to activate...
What should I do... (Fidgets)
I see. They are here...
That fox is giving me bad vibes. I don't want to get near her.

Detecting oni or demonic presence. Intercept, obliterate, defend, communicate information...
...Battle unfeasible?
Hm...that is no good.

I've detected a warrior.
Ah, my automatic invitation mode is about to activate...
What should I do... (Fidgets)

Even if you give me that look, I'm not using my arrows of love for you.
And, once again:, I'm not going to be giving anyone love advice.
You'll just have to deal with it yourself.
I have detected a fallen hero. I ask that you permit me to invite them to Valhalla, Master.

Hm, I like how determined you appear.
All right. Let's do this.

The woman who swallowed the moon... She's the most despicable woman, but she's a perfect subject for me to write about.
However, her story is not something that the me in Chaldea should write. It should just be between the me who was in that special case and the woman herself.

You all seem to be enjoying summer to the fullest! Yep. That's how it should be!
Very well. I'm going all out with the celebration! Are you ready?

Lord Raikou!
I have also changed my appearance, just like you! Wh-what do you think...? (Anxious)

I see, so you're sister Servants too?
A pleasure to meet you.

You're wondering why I always bow in admiration to him?
How could I not?
If it wasn't for his competitive spirit, showmanship, and his reckless sense of adventure, I probably wouldn't have been born.
That's essentially how journeys start.
And...he never gave up on that attitude until the very end.
That's why I bow to him.
I have detected a fallen hero. I ask that you permit me to invite them to Valhalla, Master.

What's with that getup?
A Medjed?
Stop messing with me. You're Missy Pharaoh!
Hahahaha.

Other gods have come too, it seems.
I believe in freedom, but too much freedom can be troubling...

Ah...I am not fond of that type of king...
I must take caution not to be killed...

That dedicated love of his... Lord Blackbeard is a man who certainly holds great promise.
Oh no, he is absolutely a different type of man than King Pygmalion.

Chaldea is full of strong fighters. Very nice!
All right, let's do this. I'm going to get serious.
Let's have a match!

Don't lump me in with those dregs.
They raid human homes, just killing and eating and pillaging at will, right?
It's just so...dim-witted of them.

H-h-how shameless!
Absolutely not, absolutely not!
Now you listen, y-y-you must be more modest than that!
Unacceptable, unacceptable!

Other gods have come too, it seems.
I believe in freedom, but too much freedom can be troubling...

How beautiful...
What a lovely maiden. I can see why she left a mark on history.
Oh no, no, no. This is no good.
A damsel mustn't be left out on her own in danger, and any knight who permitted this to happen would surely have his reputation tarnished.
And so, Master...
I shall go fulfill my knightly duties... Understood?
I have detected a fallen hero. I ask that you permit me to invite them to Valhalla, Master.

Excuse me.
I would like to speak to the person in charge of kitchen sanitation.
Yes, yes...
Understood. Thank you.

Um...
All you meal-makers...
Does there exist a meal that's low in calories, filling, good for digestion, nutritious, lets you lose weight the more you eat, and delicious...?

No, this will not do...
Not just any blond knight maiden will do...
You need to be far more clean, pretty, honest, and pure... More, how should I put it...

Arjuna...
It's you!
Dammit...I don't know what this feeling is!
Whatever. You're strong.
That's all I need to say for now.

Wow...it's an elephant...
That's...no good...
We need to stack...elephants...
Or else Chaldea would get full fast.

Hm, I like how determined you appear.
All right. Let's do this.

All children born on the European continent, on the great land of Europa, are my descendants.
What good children you all are!

Lately, I sometimes feel like I'm being watched... The person vanishes when I turn around, but I always catch a glimpse of a red overcoat. I wonder if they want something from me... They should just come out and say it.

My friend. My brethren.
I never would have thought to find him in such a position...
But that is simply who Lancelot is.
Allow me then, at least, to send him off with an elegy.

I know logically that we're not in the mountains, but...I can't help but get riled up.
Argh! I got no other choice! You there. You think you're strong, right? Then let's sumo wrestle!

Do you have a moment, lovely lady passing my way?
If you have some time to spare, would you care to spend it with me?
In modern terms, you'd call what I'm doing hitting on women.

Your attention please, good boys and girls! It's time for a magic trick!
Now take a good look at this silk hat. Lo and behold, a dove...
...A dove...
I-I-I-I mean, lo and behold, an angel appears!
There's absolutely no trickery here!
...Where did that dove go?

Chaldea is full of strong fighters. Very nice!
All right, let's do this. I'm going to get serious.
Let's have a match!

I don't care if they're called Nobbu or whatever, but those guys were such a pain. If those things ran amok in swarms, that would definitely mean the end of the world.
Huh? They do come out in swarms on the regular? Are you serious!?

I see. So the lady who has fox ears, which are not horns, a tail, wears a school uniform, and carries a cell phone is Suzuka Gozen?
She seems to have lumped together a lot of attributes, but I guess I can't call her an oni if she's put that much effort into it all.
Unbelievable. So Qin Shi Huang truly turned into a Zhenren!?

All children born on the European continent, on the great land of Europa, are my descendants.
What good children you all are!

Chaldea is full of strong fighters. Very nice!
All right, let's do this. I'm going to get serious.
Let's have a match!

Castor:, I don't care what happens to humans.
Pollux:, We will protect them.
Castor:, I don't care what happens...
Pollux:, I am saddened when humans die.
Castor:, Why's that?
Pollux:, Because you were once human too.
Castor:, ...

Wearing the red spear as armor is truly amusing...
Uh...ahem.
Um, I mean, what an incompetent pupil of mine.
You'll need to retrain, CÃº Chulainn.

What good children you all are!

I'm going to go invite them, so I'll step away for a while. Off I go!

...Mordred.
How did that traitor become a Heroic Spirit?
...No, I can't allow myself to hold a grudge.
Whether good or evil, we must work together now...

I sense the presence of a warrior.
Engaging automatic invitation.
...I need to step away for a while, all right?

We both fought well.
Isn't that right, Hektor of the Shining Helmet?
Anyway, let's have a drink.
We both need a stiff drink.

Touta?
The Great Sage... Heaven's Equal...?
No.
But he's still. A good disciple.

Ah...I am not fond of that type of king...
I must take caution not to be killed...

So those are the Knights of the Round Table over here. They look interesting.
...Hehe. Perhaps I'd better not mess with them. I can tell it would stir some stuff up.

The legendary hero, Lord Hektor!!!
You are ancestor to Ruggiero and to me!
Oh my, oh my, oh my!!!
U-u-um, i-it's a pleasure to meet you!
There's another Extra Class here... Interesting.

Do you have a moment, lovely lady passing my way?
If you have some time to spare, would you care to spend it with me?
In modern terms, you'd call what I'm doing hitting on women.

You all seem to be enjoying summer to the fullest! Yep. That's how it should be!

Siegfried... We are the same, yet separate entities. I am a bit jealous of his sturdiness, but that doesn't mean I am going to lose ground to him in battle.

Do you have a moment, lovely lady passing my way?
If you have some time to spare, would you care to spend it with me?
In modern terms, you'd call what I'm doing hitting on women.

Illya:, H-huh? Was Miss Sessyoin always that big? I thought she was my size...
But then again, the big Sessyoin is wonderful too! I can't put my finger on it, but she gives off the air of an elegant and refined person...like a graceful young lady raised with tender care.
Ruby:, Oh that person is actually registered on your Servant restraining order" list.
Illya:

So that's the legendary oni-slayer, lord Watanabe-no-Tsuna!
I just witnessed the way he fought, and it was very impressive. He chopped them into literal mincemeat!
Are you sure he claimed he doesn't like to kill? I bet he's one of those types who won't be satisfied until he's ground the enemy to a pulp.
Lord Emiya. Is that...is that by chance the treasured sword MÃ² YÃ©? It's not?

Castor:, The Gemini?
Pollux:, Oh, that's our Roman name, Brother.
Castor:, Oh that's right. It doesn't sound too bad.
Pollux:, Do you like it?
Castor:, I didn't say I liked it.

Horned beings who are not human...so they're called oni.
Their horns seem to be different than mine, but we may have similar origins.
Which means their descendants may turn into something similar to me eventually...

So Elisabeth BÃ¡thory is also wearing a swimsuit.
Her bikini looks like armor...do you think it'll rust in salt water?
Hey wait a minute, doesn't it seem like more of her pop up every year?

Hm? Hnnngh. Master!
Who is that dual-wielding lancer?
Well, it's just that, even if we are from different nations and the times, I have a feeling we would get along very well...!

Heracles...
I guess when we talk about what a real hero or valorous sort is, he's bound to come up.
It's a shame he's lost his sense of reason.

The legendary King Arthur...
I had...
No idea...
They were a woman!

I never imagined the famous Anti-Hero could live here so peacefully...I do not know whether or not this is Asterios's true nature, but of this much I can be sure:, he responded to your summons because he sensed and was drawn to your goodness.

I don't like gods.
Doesn't matter if they're old or new...they never do anything good.
Hey Master, can I kill them?

A magical girl?
But I don't use any magic, and don't carry a wand either.
Heehee. What are you talking about?

Baobhan Sith...High Queen Morgan's daughter.
And, my colleague.
...I've always known her to be a wanton killer, but I have no right to criticize her folly...
Beneath it all, we're cut from the same cloth.

There is another me among the Heroic Spirits you summoned.
Yes. Each of those Servants are still me.
That is not to say we are exactly the same person.

I know logically that we're not in the mountains, but...I can't help but get riled up.
Argh! I got no other choice! You there. You think you're strong, right? Then let's sumo wrestle!

You're...Red Hare...no, Lu Bu...?
Argh, whatever!
Anyway, I'll give you the honor of having me ride on your back. Now go!
...
H-hey, w-wait, you're going too fast!
Ack!

Forming a contract with the King of Heroes... Impressive.
He...is a Heroic Spirit with problems, to be sure, but his abilities are unparalleled.
You'll get used to him sooner or later.
Well, I will never get used to him though.

A familiar face...or perhaps not...
Hmmm...
No, it must be my imagination. My apologies.

I'm glad you seem to be feeling well, but...
(sigh) Why are you like this, Baobhan Sith?
You need to fix that habit of crying over things you broke yourself.

Have you forgotten what Miss Nightingale told you to do?

Unacceptable, unacceptable!

I'm cute, you say? Yeah, I know.
Surprised I'm so cute? Oh, now I get it. You must be a fan of the grown-up me.
Santa, no, my Santa mentor! What? You're not Santa here? Ah, I see! You're a Secret Santa! I've got it now, I'll keep it under wraps!
A champion of the poor... We may not be of the same God, but he too is worthy of the title of Saint. If you allow me to say so, I think he should work on boosting his Master Luck... Indeed.

Master, you are still young.

What are you supposed to do when you return from a Rayshift?
And your answer is...?
That's right. Wash your hands! And gargle!
Do you understand?

Oni are essentially the embodiment of moral corruption.
We must eradicate them right away.

Hey, kid. Yeah, I'm talking to you, kid.
Don't stay out too late. Come back before the sun sets.
Got it? GOT IT???

Hm, there seems to be a slew of strong warriors here.
I would like to ask to duel with them...
But I suppose such an all-out match between swordsmen is frowned upon, right?

Um, an archer of the Argonautai...oh right, Atalante.
She and I actually get along.
We talked a lot when we were on the island.
We even argued over who had worse taste in things.

A duplicate of me, huh?
Hm, looking at my own body is somewhat bizarre.
So I never imagined I was this lovely. Hm, the more I look at her...
Fuhahahaha! More... Come closer!
Hey, what's wrong with admiring my own self?
Whoa! I know it's my face, but that face of yours is rather annoying!

Master, you are still young.

Oryou:, Off-topic, but don't you think your sword's too big? It'll get caught in the door.

Hey! It's Karl der GroÃŸe...I mean, Charlemagne! It's been a while! How's it going? Are you on social media? No?
Well, that aside, you still don't look like an emperor at all!

So you're the famed Sigurd...the great Norse hero!
The rumors were true...
Yeah, with looks like yours, I don't blame Lancer for falling in love with you.
Nice.
All right! Let's have the great heroes of the North and East drink the night away!

Shuten! Look!
Look how much I...hm?
Oh my

SPIRIT ORIGIN EROSION DETECTED. ACTIVATING AUTOMATED DEFENSES.
...Huh? Did something happen?
Oh, it's Ashiya Douman. He snuck some malicious data in, so I purged it.
We're all good now.

Actually, there's something I'm really into right now...
And that is...Elisabeth JAPAN!
The way she carries herself on stage, and the originality of her ideas both old and new, it all makes her a pioneer of her time!
I would very much like to have a combined performance with her!
Ah, what a feast for my eyes. These swimsuits are truly good...

Ah...what a lovely maiden...
Oh...I beg your pardon.
It's nothing, my lady.
I hope you have a wonderful day.

An Indian Heroic Spirit is here!
Wonderful. India is like a second home to me... No, it's more like my soul's home.
I do so hope we can become friends!

Mysterious Heroine X? I feel some affinity with that name...
Huh? She's coming this way with such intensity and speed...
Whoa! R-Ranmaru is not a Saber! See? I am an Avenger!
Phew...
There she goes.
She mumbled something about me having a similar face... What was that about?
I have detected a fallen hero. I ask that you permit me to invite them to Valhalla, Master.

This happened because I am a completely perfect empress. Children, I understand you might be envious, but wearing a swimsuit doesn't automatically let you grow up to be an adult. Don't feel rushed! Just work hard to better yourself!
There's another Extra Class here... Interesting.

They may not resemble or act the same way, but whenever I see boys of that age...
Well, it brings me back.
Hm? Are they eating apples?
Hey Master. It's okay for them to bite it, but tell them not to put it on top of their heads.
Just watching them makes my heart rate go up.

You all seem to be enjoying summer to the fullest! Yep. That's how it should be!

...Yes. Yes.
Hehehe. Master, Master. Lady Skadi praised me.
She said that it's good to be in high spirits!
Let me tell you something. I inadvertently called that samurai Tsuda" when I met him

They are...let's see...they are like my descendants' friends!
Come, all! You're all sweeties!

It's such a pleasure drinking with Odysseus!
We have the same interests.
I feel we're not strangers at all.

Ah, Lord Ushiwaka. I've remembered an urgent matter I need to take care of, so I will be taking my leave! Eh? I need to accompany you in your training? Well you see, my chronic bone fractures have started acting up...!

That rowdy girl from the other day...or rather, the Demon King of the Sixth Heaven, was it? I like her methods...
But then again, she still pisses me off.

Obviously Amor and Ireland's Child of Light have no connection whatsoever. The only reason I know of CÃº Chulainn is likely because of his history with Caren Hortensia.
...Well technically that experience itself simply happened in a dream, so as someone who is awake, I wouldn't know anything about it.

Unacceptable, unacceptable!

What's with that sack? You can pull food out as much as you want? No matter how exotic the food may be?
...Interesting, show us what you can do then.

Yagyu Tajima-no-kami Munenori...I see that he is a sword master with great stature in this universe too.
That is a wonderful thing and he is quite distinguished.
That is what a dark swordsman should be like.

I like you too. To make a contract with one so reckless as him.
Huh, who do I mean?
That's obvious.
That big, loud Rider with the big attitude!

Hey you. Yes, you, I'm talking to you.
My Christmas present, the roulette, is broken. Exchange it for me.
Cooling-off period?
Huh, what? It's already over?
Don't screw with me!
